data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ye, Zhen, Bu, Wenjun (2015): A review of the genus Xiphovelia Lundblad, 1933 (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Veliidae) from China, with descriptions of three new species. Zootaxa 3946 (2): 190-200, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3946.2.2
